definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
can't bear having grit in one's eye (idiom)/unable to put sth objectionable out of one's mind/not prepared to turn a blind eye
pinyin: yan3 li3 rong2 bu5 de2 sha1 zi5

definition: see 眼裡容不得沙子|眼里容不得沙子[yan3 li3 rong2 bu5 de2 sha1 zi5]
pinyin: yan3 li3 rou2 bu5 de2 sha1 zi5

sentences.english: My beard and clothes are crusted with sand, my body is sore and aching.
sentences.chinese: 我的胡须和衣服上都是沙子，我的浑身酸痛。

sentences.english: We can enjoy the sea breeze and the soft sand.
sentences.chinese: 我们能吹吹海风，还能踩在软软的沙子上。

sentences.english: In order to prevent sand getting in my eyes, I wear a pair of sun-glasses.
sentences.chinese: 为了防止沙子迷眼，我戴上了一副墨镜。

sentences.english: The waves had pushed the sand into little ridges .
sentences.chinese: 海浪推动沙子形成了小小的沙垄。

sentences.english: Separating the gold from the dirt was done in a washing cradle.
sentences.chinese: 将金子和沙子分开是用淘金槽完成的。

sentences.english: The men shoveled the sand into a cart .
sentences.chinese: 这些人用铲子把沙子装进车里。

sentences.english: While (he was)walking along the sands . Crusoe saw some footprints in the sand.
sentences.chinese: 克鲁索沿沙滩走着的时候，看到沙子上有些脚印。

sentences.english: The city is covered with sand.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市到处都是沙子。

sentences.english: They drew a line in the sand —or rather, in this case, in the rugged terrain in the middle of the Korean peninsula —where the 38th parallel had been set down at Potsdam.
sentences.chinese: 他们在沙子上画了一条线，就是波茨坦定下的三八线。

sentences.english: Dr. Holman watches some sand sites, but from a distance. “I don’t participate in the chats, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 郝曼博士到过一些沙子有关的网站，不过他并不参与。

sentences.english: Make sure you buy clean river sand, not beach sand.
sentences.chinese: 确保你买干净河沙，不海滩的沙子。

sentences.english: The sand in the water gravitated to the bottom of the bottle.
sentences.chinese: 水中的沙子沉淀到瓶底。
他们的工作就是“淘洗沙子”。

sentences.english: Half a dozen dump trucks were beetling around with loads of supplemental sand.
sentences.chinese: 五六台自卸车装着填充用的沙子中那里忙碌。

sentences.english: The sand here is fine and white.
It was found that the Mycoplasma remained viable in the sand for eight months after the sand was moved.
sentences.chinese: 结果发现，八个月后沙子中仍然有支原体存在。
